Thanks — I checked.

What I found
- Repository alicemiller/sorting_searching shows a pending collaborator: "emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com" (so the invitation was created and is still pending).
- I attempted to read your inbox for the GitHub invitation but could not retrieve any invitation email from the linked inbox here.

What you can do to accept the invitation
1. Check the invitation email from GitHub (sent to emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com) and click the "View invitation" / "Accept invitation" link inside the message.
2. If you don't find the email, sign in to GitHub with your account and accept from the notifications/invitations area:
   - Click the bell icon (Notifications) and look for an "Invitation" item, or
   - Visit your invitations page in GitHub (Notifications → Invitations / or the Invitations section shown in your account banner when signed in).
3. If you still can't find the invite:
   - Ask Alice to cancel and re-send the invite, or
   - Ask Alice to confirm which email address she used for the invite.

If you want, I can:
- Try checking your inbox again (I already attempted once). If you'd like me to retry, I will re-check for the invitation email.
- Draft a short message you can send to Alice asking her to re-send the invite (I can send it if you provide Alice's email).
